data.heading: About me
data.title: Founder of
data.description:
Hello! I'm Omkar, a passionate developer and the founder of Reachoout. My journey in technology began at a young age, and since then, I've dedicated myself to building impactful digital solutions.

Over the years, I've worked with a diverse range of clients, helping them bring their ideas to life through innovative web applications and user-centric designs. My expertise spans across full-stack development, UI/UX design, and CRM consulting.

  • Founder of Reachoout, a B2B networking platform connecting professionals worldwide.
  • Developed and launched over 15,000 projects for clients in various industries.
  • Recognized for delivering high-quality solutions and exceptional client service.
  • Skilled in modern frameworks like Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS.
  • Experienced in building scalable backend systems and RESTful APIs.
  • Proficient in designing intuitive user interfaces that enhance user engagement.
  • Consulted for startups and enterprises to optimize their CRM workflows.
  • Recipient of multiple industry awards for innovation and leadership.
  • Active contributor to open-source projects and tech communities.
  • Mentor to aspiring developers and designers, sharing knowledge and best practices.
  • Always eager to learn new technologies and take on challenging projects.

When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new design trends, reading about emerging tech, or collaborating with fellow innovators. Let's connect and create something amazing together!

projects.heading: 01. Reachoout
projects.subtitle: B2B Networking Platform
projects.description: Reachoout is a B2B networking platform designed to connect professionals and businesses worldwide. The platform offers real-time messaging, advanced search, and personalized recommendations to foster meaningful business relationships. Built with Next.js, React, and Node.js, Reachoout features a scalable architecture and a user-friendly interface. Unique aspects include AI-powered matchmaking and robust privacy controls. Targeted at entrepreneurs, recruiters, and business owners, I led the full-stack development, UI/UX design, and deployment of the platform.

projects.heading: 02. Devfolio Clone
projects.subtitle: Portfolio Generator for Developers
projects.description: A customizable portfolio generator built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, aimed at helping developers showcase their work online.

projects.heading: 03. TaskMaster
projects.subtitle: Team Collaboration App
projects.description: TaskMaster is a real-time team task manager with WebSocket support, kanban-style UI, and role-based access control.
